<title level="1" pfs="">[Charlatan](/NPCs.aspx?ID=3428)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Charlatans use pretense and misdirection to swindle money and other valuables from the credulous and confused.

<column gap="tiny">

([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=47)): DC 18

</column>

</column>

<title level="2" right="Creature 3">[Charlatan](/NPCs.aspx?ID=3428)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=627" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=628" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [NPC Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=236) pg. 20

**Perception** +6

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=34) +8, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=38) +11, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=39) +9, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=44) +7, [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=45) +11, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=47) +7, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=48) +8, [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=50) +8, [Underworld Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=41) +9

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +0

**Dex** +3

**Con** +0

**Int** +2

**Wis** +1

**Cha** +4
</row>

**Versatile Performance** The charlatan can use their [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=45) skill to [Make an Impression](/Actions.aspx?ID=2392), to [Demoralize](/Actions.aspx?ID=2395), and they can use an acting Performance to [Impersonate](/Actions.aspx?ID=2388).

**Items**
[Disguise Kit](/Equipment.aspx?ID=19), lute, [Shortsword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=43), [Thieves' Toolkit](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2758), [Whip](/Weapons.aspx?ID=48)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 18 

**Fort** +5 

**Ref** +8 

**Will** +10 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 40

</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
shortsword +10 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d6+2 piercing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
whip +10 ([Disarm](/Traits.aspx?ID=175), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188), [Reach](/Traits.aspx?ID=192), [Trip](/Traits.aspx?ID=196)),
**Damage** 1d4+2 slashing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fist +10 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188), [Unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199)),
**Damage** 1d4+2 bludgeoning

**Occult Spontaneous Spells** DC 20, attack +12
- **Cantrips (2nd)**
[Daze](/Spells.aspx?ID=61), [Figment](/Spells.aspx?ID=1528), [Message](/Spells.aspx?ID=190), [Prestidigitation](/Spells.aspx?ID=229), [Telekinetic Hand](/Spells.aspx?ID=1715)
- **1st**
[Disguise Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=1491), [Illusory Disguise](/Spells.aspx?ID=159), [Ventriloquism](/Spells.aspx?ID=356) (3 slots)
- **2nd**
[Charm](/Spells.aspx?ID=34), [Illusory Disguise](/Spells.aspx?ID=159), [Invisibility](/Spells.aspx?ID=164) (2 slots)

**Bard Composition Spells 1 Focus Point,** DC 19
- **Cantrips (1st)**
[Courageous Anthem](/Spells.aspx?ID=1763)
- **1st**
[Counter Performance](/Spells.aspx?ID=381)

**Sneak Attack**   The charlatan deals an extra 1d6 precision damage to [off-guard](/Conditions.aspx?ID=58) creatures.

</column>
